sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import Card1 from './Card2' import Card2 from './Card2' import Card3 from './Card3' im const Cards = () => { $(document).ready(function(){ $(".nav-tabs a").click(function(){ $(this).tab('show'); }); $('.nav-tabs a').on('shown.bs.tab', function(event){ var x = $(event.target).text(); // active tab var y = $(event.relatedTarget).text(); // previous tab $(".act span").text(x); $(".prev span").text(y); }); }); return ( <>

Dynamic Tabs with jQuery

Click on the Tabs to display the active and previous tab.
